channel.title: Need help with Casting on a player
channel.description: Ok for lunar magic spells in the prayer tab, and the spell is in a case for a "prayer". I need to know how i can get it to cast on another player while it is in the prayer tab and is a "prayer" case.

item.title: Need help with Casting on a player
item.dc:creator: @Jairiya Jairiya
item.description:
@Jairiya wrote:

Yes, exactly what i want it to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Casting on a player

item.title: Need help with Casting on a player
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

So in other words you want to know how to make it so when you click on a “prayer”, you can then click on a player, therefore casting a spell on him?

Read full topic
